title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Industrial Engineering Problem solving through JAVA, Optimisation and Statistical Packages, Database Management, Exercises of Simulation and Gaming with the help of decision support systems and system dynamics models. Reallife business and production/ operation games will be demonstrated.
